page.title: 10A Children's Game
page.content: {"Rotten Eggy" {************* is a game for boys and girls. Someone is chosen to be{"it" After closing his eyes the rest scatter while he counts to twenty then he shouts{"ROTTEN EGGY!"}The rest have to stand still with their legs wide open. The person who is{"it"}tries to roll a tennis ball through someone's legs and whoever's legs it rolls through has got to go through the{ {"death chamber."}In the{"death {chamber"}everyone has to make an arch against the wall with their arms and then the{"victim"}has to try and get through the chamber while everyone thumps and kicks them! The{"victim"} then starts a new game. {
